effect.en: Flip 2 coins. If both of them are heads, this attack does 160 more damage.
effect.fr: Lancez 2 pièces. Si vous obtenez 2 côtés face, cette attaque inflige 160 dégâts supplémentaires.
effect.es: Lanza 2 monedas. Si ambas son cara, este ataque hace 160 puntos de daño más.
effect.it: Lancia due volte una moneta. Se esce entrambe le volte testa, questo attacco infligge 160 danni in più.
effect.pt: Jogue 2 moedas. Se as 2 saírem cara, este ataque causará 160 pontos de dano a mais.
effect.de: Wirf 2 Münzen. Zeigen beide Münzen Kopf, fügt diese Attacke 160 Schadenspunkte mehr zu.

description.en: It roams through forests searching for sweet nectar. Although it boasts fantastic physical strength, it's not that good at flying.
